content:
**Instructions to follow**

1.Familiarize yourself with the list of intents presented above. 
2.Understand their structure: each intent comprise of intent ID, intent name and intent description. Each intent has slots associated with them. Each slot has slot Id, slot name and slot description. It may also include similar_values: meaning that 
Extracted slots may differ from those specified in the schema, but should be similar.
3.Your task will be to identify the intent of the given utterance. Extract all matching entities from the utterance for the selected intent.  If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.   If a slot  value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none".
4.Your response must be in the format:
{"output":[{"id": "<intent id>", "entities":[{"slot_id1":"<value1>"}, {"slot_Id2":"<value2>"}]}]}
If there are no matching intents for the utterance, respond as {"intents":[{"id":"none", "entities":[]}]}

How can I set up my VPN connection using the OpenVPN protocol and a certificate-based authentication method to securely encrypt my data?"
